name: Balloonomania
description:
Will you do whatever it takes to win in the grandest race of the century?

It is natural, that only the noblest and intellectually advanced individuals associate themselves with phenomena as grand as themselves: the Balloonomania Race!

Sabotage other balloonists in a frenzy for the highest score, though beware competitors will share this aim!

HELP US IMPROVE!

If you'd like to help us improve this prototype, please fill in this survey! We'd love to hear your thoughts on it. It takes only about 5 minutes of your time. 

https://forms.gle/q9qWxyHHnhXYY24C7


The goal for this prototype is to stay airborne! However, other competitors will try to eternally sink you.

Maneuver your way through the wind currents whilst you repair your vessel, dodge or sabotage others!

This prototype can only be played with mouse and keyboard.




This Balloonomania prototype was developed in one and a half week by our team of 4 people, based in the Netherlands.

This is by no means a finished game. However, with your feedback and support, we hope to learn how we can improve the experience.

Feel free to contact us and share your thoughts with regards to the concept!

Music and sound design by: Tyas van den Bergh

https://www.sound-potion.com/
